summary: Contoso Wireless offers a streaming product as an add-on to their service for a monthly fee of $5. This product offers unlimited streaming of music, movies, and TV shows from popular platforms like Netflix, Hulu, and Amazon Prime. Customers can get discounts on the streaming product if they sign up for an annual plan or refer friends or family members to Contoso Wireless. Customers must also use an unlimited data plan and connect their devices to Wi-Fi whenever possible in order to avoid additional data usage costs.
